original_text:
If they hide themselves on the top of Carmel,
    from there I will search them out and take them;
and if they hide from my sight at the bottom of the sea,
    there I will command the serpent, and it shall bite them.
korean_text: 갈멜 산 꼭대기에 숨을지라도 내가 거기에서 찾아낼 것이요 내 눈을 피하여 바다 밑에 숨을지라도 내가 거기에서 뱀을 명령하여 물게 할 것이요

sentences.original_text: If they hide themselves on the top of Carmel,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 갈멜 산 꼭대기에 스스로를 숨긴다면,

sentences.original_text: from there I will search them out and take them;
sentences.korean_translation: 내가 거기서부터 그들을 찾아내고 그들을 잡으리라;

sentences.original_text: and if they hide from my sight at the bottom of the sea,
sentences.korean_translation: 그들이 바다 밑바닥에서 내 눈을 피해 숨는다면,

sentences.original_text: there I will command the serpent,
